output:
And the time that it takes to get to you, over you, is gonna be the last time that I do.
Close your eyes, it's already late out there, dear.
Don't you feel that all the lies that you were breaked, that you will break too?
There's no need to say why that you're gone.
I know your voice means goodbye, so, so long.
It's such a shame that all of this went on without a word about it.
Close your eyes, it's already late out there, dear.
Don't you feel that all of this time might have made it the last time that it could?
If the last time ever comes.
